pages.text: $(l)Draupnir Spear$() is a legendary weapon of unparalleled might, forged by the Lady of the Forge and blessed by $(l)Brok$(). $(br2)This spear, born from the enchanted Draupnir Ring, possesses the extraordinary ability to replicate itself endlessly, making it a formidable tool in the hands of a true warrior.$(br2)$(l)Abilities:$()$(li)$(l)Replication:$() Draupnir Spear can multiply itself, allowing the wielder to launch a barrage of spears at their foes.$(li)$(l)Wind’s Concussive Force:$() Each spear can be detonated with a shift right click (no more than 5 spears at a time), unleashing a powerful concussive blast of wind that devastates enemies.$(li)$(l)Rapid Strikes:$() The spear can strike with incredible speed, advancing the wielder closer to their target with each blow.$(li)$(l)Loyalty:$() The spear is loyal to its master, ensuring that no other warrior can lift it from the ground.

pages.title: Draupnir Spear Base
pages.text: Obtaining this weapon involves both crafting and trading. $(br2)Firstly, one must craft the $(l)Draupnir Spear Base$().

pages.title: Draupnir Ring
pages.text: Secondly, one will need the $(l)Draupnir Ring$(), which can be purchased from $(l:entities/huldra_brothers)Brok and Sindri$().
Which will both be given to the Huldra brothers to make the legendary $(l)Draupnir Spear$().
